scripts.minify: minify src/css/animations.css > dist/css/animations.min.css && minify src/css/components.css > dist/css/components.min.css && minify src/css/global.css > dist/css/global.min.css && minify src/css/responsive-desktop.css > dist/css/responsive-desktop.min.css && minify src/css/responsive-mobile.css > dist/css/responsive-mobile.min.css && minify src/css/responsive-tablet.css > dist/css/responsive-tablet.min.css && minify src/css/style.css > dist/css/style.min.css && minify src/js/animations.js > dist/js/animations.min.js && minify src/js/components.js > dist/js/components.min.js && minify src/js/main.js > dist/js/main.min.js && minify src/js/utils.js > dist/js/utils.min.js
